mapper.select: SELECT device_product_field.id, device_product_field.product_id, device_product_field.field, device_product_field.field_type, device_product_field.label, device_product_field.create_time, device_product_field.update_time FROM device_product_field INNER JOIN device_product ON device_product_field.product_id = device_product.id INNER JOIN device_device ON device_device.product_id = device_product.id WHERE device_device.id = #{deviceId}
